mapper.insert: insert into ordersheet (to_name, to_address1, to_address2, to_address3, order_id, memo, order_num, pay_with, final_price, thumnail, count_product, thumnail_name) values (#{toName}, #{toAddress1}, #{toAddress2}, #{toAddress3}, #{orderId} ,IFNULL(#{memo}, null), #{orderNum}, #{payWith} ,#{finalPrice}, #{thumnail}, #{countProduct},#{thumnailName})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ordersheet WHERE order_id=#{orderId} and order_num=#{orderNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE productsheet SET delivery_state=#{deliveryState} WHERE id=#{id} and order_num=#{orderNum}
